title: True Detective Season 3 Trailer Explained
author: Think Story
comment: I'm hyped for it.  Especially excited for the setting since I grew up in  northeast Arkansas. I still doubt they will ever be able to top a season as epic as season 1.
NW Arkansas is VERY similar to NE, Oklahoma. I’m excited to see a tv show depicted in some of the most beautiful scenery in America.
Really excited for this new season. Hope you are too!
Hope season three turns it around and it becomes a classic
It's actually divided into 3 time periods, all separate. At least thats what I've heard. But I'm hoping this one will be good!
description:
I breakdown the new trailer for True Detective Season 3 and what may lay in store for us in this upcoming season!
